{{Refimprove|date=June 2010}} {{Primary sources|date=June 2010}} {{Infobox political party | country = Egypt | party_name = Democratic Generation Party | native_name = Hizb El-Geel al-Democrati
Ø­Ø²Ø¨ Ø§ÙØ¬ÙÙ Ø§ÙØ¯ÙÙÙØ±Ø§Ø·Ù | chairman = [[Nagy Abdel-Fattah Al-Shehabi]] | foundation = 2002 | headquarters = [[Cairo]] | ideology = [[Liberal Democracy]] | newspaper = | website = | colorcode = black }} The '''Democratic Generation Party''' or '''Hizb El-Geel al-Democrati''' ({{lang-ar|Ø­Ø²Ø¨ Ø§ÙØ¬ÙÙ Ø§ÙØ¯ÙÙÙØ±Ø§Ø·Ù}}) is a [[political party]] in [[Egypt]]. The Democratic Generation Party might be considered as a [[liberal parties|liberal party]]. == Platform == * The inculcation of the principles of national unity into the fabric of Egyptian society. * Integration between [[Nile]]-basin countries. * An agriculture-oriented technology infra-structure. * A long-term youth strategy. * An improved status of teachers and [[education]]. * A more active Egyptian role at the African, Arab and Islamic levels. == See also == *[[Liberalism]] *[[Contributions to liberal theory]] *[[Liberalism worldwide]] *[[List of liberal parties]] *[[Liberal democracy]] *[[Liberalism in Egypt]] == External links == *[http://www2.sis.gov.eg/En/Politics/Parties/Parties/041102000000000024.htm Democratic Generation Party on Egypt State Information Service (SIS)] {{Egyptian political parties}} [[Category:Liberal parties]] [[Category:Political parties in Egypt]] [[Category:Political parties established in 2006]] {{liberalparty-stub}} {{Egypt-party-stub}} [[ar:Ø­Ø²Ø¨ Ø§ÙØ¬ÙÙ Ø§ÙØ¯ÙÙÙØ±Ø§Ø·Ù]]
